Name: Double-sided sculptor's model
Description: This sculptor's model presents on one side the head of a ram and on the other side a bull. Along the bottom edge is a thin line as the baseline. The surfaces are polished and the figures are beautifully worked; only the ram's head has some traces of the fine flat chisel's work. The panel has an diagonal fracture running from the top down towards the right. This has been repaired. On the ram side, the bottom right-hand corner is missing.
